item_1.question_1: Do you have the desire to eat when you are irritated?

item_2.question_2: Do you have a desire to eat when you have nothing to do?

item_3.question_3: Do you have a desire to eat when you are depressed or discouraged?

item_4.question_4: Do you have a desire to eat when you are feeling lonely?

item_5.question_5: Do you have a desire to eat when somebody lets you down?
